refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.para: If the SVG Module is used, ImageObjects can include svg:svg graphics.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The Scalable Vector Graphics Recommendation from the W3C defines the features and syntax for SVG, a language for describing two-dimensional vector and mixed vector/raster graphics in &XML;.
A complete description of SVG is outside the scope of this reference.
